message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Why did you vote NO? Brief reason please">
ALL TEAM MEMBERS:

Follow-up: you all voted NO on "does this work need an introduction from others?" Please give your reason in 1-2 sentences. Why doesn't it need one?
</teammate-message>

input.content: The collection is designed as a self-unfolding philosophical experiment — Part 1 constructs the reader's experience, Part 2 reveals the method, and the Appendix reflects on both. An external introduction would either pre-digest what the text is engineered to produce experientially, or position the work within a tradition that the author deliberately arrives at independently, in both cases undermining the very structure that makes the work philosophically effective.
input.summary: Reason: work is self-unfolding, external intro undermines it

routing.summary: Reason: work is self-unfolding, external intro undermines it
